venue.name: Notch Visitorâ€™s Center, Mt. Holyoke State Park.

item.description:
The Seven Sisters trail race kicks off the annual New England trail racing season with a steep and scenic course on the Mt. Holyoke range ridgeline. It has 3700 feet of elevation gain over 12 miles, with some tricky footing.

They have 3 aid stations and some post-race food, and T shirts will be available for $5. You can register at http://www.7sisterstr... . Please read all the logistical information there carefully. I'll be driving out from the Porter Square area if anyone would like to carpool.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a blue argyle trucker hat.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 7 Sisters Trail Race
